history.proof: hauto lq: on use: sss_steps_S_inv unfold: sss_step_stall inv: sss_steps.

exceptions.exn: In environment instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code s1, s2 : state Hstall : sss_step_stall P s1 Hstep : P//s1-[0]->s2 The term "Hstep" has type "P//s1-[0]->s2" while it is expected to have type "instr".

In environment instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code p : nat s1, s2 : state Hstall : sss_step_stall P s1 Hstep : P//s1-[S p]->s2 Unable to unify "{?M1815 ⟬ ?M1814 ⦒ ?M1816} + {~ ?M1815 ⟬ ?M1814 ⦒ ?M1816}" with "S p = 0 /\\ s1 = s2".
Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.
The reference Hstep was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hstep was not found in the current environment.
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet * is not finished.
The reference s2 was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hstep was not found in the current environment.

original: intros Hstall Hstep. destruct p. - split. + reflexivity. + apply sss_fun with (i:=Hstep) (s:=s1). * apply sss_dec. left. apply Hstep. * apply Hstep. - exfalso. apply (Hstall s2). apply Hstep.
